Title: Desdemona Despair App
Description: Desdemona Despair is a Windows Store app that implements a simple feed reader for the  Desdemona Despair blog.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Desdemona Despair is a Windows Store app that implements a simple feed reader for the Desdemona Despair blog.

This app shows how to use these Windows 8 technologies:

- The SyndicationFeed class
- Live Tile updates by using a Background Task
- C#/XAML for presentation
